0: The bar inside the hotel does not open till 3 pm
Even when it was not their position they still took care of my request
I should say that I decided to move out of the Arabele even though I had already paid for a 7 night stay
First they wanted to know if I was coming back for it
We booked a couple of trips about 5 months ago
This may have been the best hotel shower I have ever had
The wait staff just all walked by and no one asked if we had been helped yet

Furniture in the room is fairly spartan and oddly placed for instance our room with a king sized bed had only one comfortable chair leaving the other person to either sit on the floor or at the desk chair despite the room having ample room for a second chair or a love seat
Restaurant they ran out of the specialty beef and at breakfast for some reason always served our coffee tea without any teaspoons
1: When we got a special offer to stay at the Four Seasons Vail we could not resist the opportunity to try it out
So yes many great things about this hotel but the terrible WiFi certainly soured the entire experience
Would highly recommend burgers and the ribs
We are already looking to book a Four Seasons for a vacation
I traveled with my husband and two teenage daughters
Overall I think the best thing about this property is the staff
They made sure your comfort was their priority one
2: The staff is most attentive and courteous
All the staff that we interacted with was amazing
We have just been staying at Four Seasons Vail
Arrived with amazing chocolate treat waiting for me and the beds are cloud like
Next I had champagne and fruit with a card in the room upon arrival
We stayed in a two bedroom residence which we LOVED
The spa is luxurious and professional
Highly recommend this resort our stay was wonderful can not wait for our next vocation
The spa is very nice and Carol is a lovely person
